name: Malazan Empire
description: The dominant imperial power, founded by Kellanved and Dancer. Known for its military prowess and expansionist policies.

name: Bridgeburners
description: Elite military unit of the Malazan Empire, known for their loyalty and effectiveness in the most dangerous missions.

name: Tiste Andii
description: Ancient race of dark-skinned beings with powerful magic, led by Anomander Rake.

name: Tiste Edur
description: Grey-skinned race that conquered the Letherii Empire, wielding shadow magic.

name: Tiste Liosan
description: Light-wielding cousins of the Tiste Andii, dwelling in the realm of Light.

name: Whirlwind
description: Massive rebellion against Malazan rule in Seven Cities, led by Sha'ik and fueled by the Whirlwind Goddess.

name: Pannion Domin
description: Cannibalistic theocracy that swept across Genabackis, led by the Pannion Seer.

name: Seguleh
description: Warrior society obsessed with martial perfection, ranking themselves by combat prowess.

name: Crimson Guard
description: Elite mercenary company bound by the Vow, sworn enemies of the Malazan Empire.

name: Jaghut
description: Ancient race of ice-wielding beings, mostly solitary and philosophical in nature.

name: T'lan Imass
description: Undead army of the Imass people, bound by ritual to hunt the Jaghut for eternity.

name: Letherii Empire
description: Merchant empire focused on acquisition and debt, conquered by the Tiste Edur.

name: K'Chain Che'Malle
description: Ancient race of intelligent dinosaur-like beings with advanced technology.

name: Forkrul Assail
description: Ancient race obsessed with justice and purity, seeking to cleanse the world.

name: Claw
description: Elite intelligence and assassination organization serving the Malazan Empire.

name: Moranth
description: Insectoid humanoid species allied with the Malazan Empire, known for their alchemical weapons.
